Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent the Controller and invokes actions which modify the Model directly. The Controller initialize the model inside its constructor, and then handles every turn with its main method handleTurnPhase(). this method changes basing on the TurnPhase.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private ActionPhase actionPhase
      Action phase handler
      private boolean activateFrenzy
      if true frenzy will be enabled at the end of the turn
      private java.lang.Boolean expectingAnswer
      if true the controller is waiting for an answer by the client
      private java.lang.Boolean expectingGrenade
      if true the controller is waiting for a grenade answer by the client
      private java.lang.Boolean frenzy
      true if in frenzy phase, false otherwise
      private int frenzyStarter
      ID of the player who started frenzy phase
      private boolean gameEnded
      True if the game has ended to stop the controller
      private int gameId
      ID of the game used to save/load multiple games
      private java.lang.Boolean hasSomeoneDied
      true if some player has died this turn, to let the controller know it needs to calc points
      private static java.util.logging.Level level  
      private static java.util.logging.Logger LOGGER  
      private Model model
      reference to the model
      private Observers observers
      is the reference to the observers class that links to all the observers
      private java.util.List<VirtualView> players
      List of VirtualView, which are seen as real view by the controller by network abstraction
      private PointCounter pointCounter
      Point counter handler
      private PowerUpPhase powerUpPhase
      PowerUp phase handler
      private java.util.Random rand
      random
      private boolean reloadGame
      True if this game has been reloaded, false otherwise
      private ReloadPhase reloadPhase
      Reload phase handler
      private int roundNumber
      number of the current round, used to determin whose turn is now
      private java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> shotPlayerThisTurn
      list of player IDs representing which player has been shot this tunrn
      private SpawnPhase spawnPhase
      SpawnPhase handler
      private Timer timer
      Timer to manage user's turn time limit
      private TurnPhase turnPhase
      current turn phase, initialized by default to spawn
      private UtilityMethods utilityMethods

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void activateFrenzy()
      This method activate Frenzy Mode
      boolean askMoveValid​(int row, int column, Directions direction)  
      private void checkActionIsFrenzy()
      this method is used for the frenzyShoot action to ensure that the player will not perform a frenzy shoot while frenzy is not enabled is used only in this case because for the others actions the action type is the same so this case will be evaluated internally
      private void checkActionIsNotFrenzy()
      this method is used for the shoot action to ensure that the player will not perform a shoot while frenzy is enabled is used only in this case because for the others actions the action type is the same so this case will be evaluated internally
      private int chooseMap​(int playerNumber)

      This method will send default answer if the timer for the action ended

      This method will discard a powerUp

      This method will be called from the view class and will make the player do an action

      java.util.List<VirtualView> getVirtualViews()  
      void handleTurnPhase()
      This is the method that will cycle through all the phases of the turn and call the relative methods The controller is designed to call for each phase the handlePhase method that will ask the view the param for the action the view will answer wit a doAction() method

      This method will increment the TurnPhase and recall the handleTurnPhase

      • sendInitialUpdate

        private void sendInitialUpdate​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> nameList,
                               java.util.List<PlayerColor> playerColors,
                               int gameId,
                               int mapType)
        This method will send to all clients an update of type INITIAL
        Parameters:
        nameList - is the list of names of the players
        playerColors - is the list of colors of the players
        gameId - is the id of the current game
        mapType - is the type of the map
        See Also:
        InitialUpdate

      • handleTurnPhase

        public void handleTurnPhase()
        This is the method that will cycle through all the phases of the turn and call the relative methods The controller is designed to call for each phase the handlePhase method that will ask the view the param for the action the view will answer wit a doAction() method
        See Also:
        (in case of spawn), there is also an END phase which is used for point calculation, to enable frenzy, save, and check if game needs to end

      • incrementPhase

        public void incrementPhase()
        This method will increment the TurnPhase and recall the handleTurnPhase
        See Also:
        for the phases we used an enum, if the phase is set to the last one ( END) will be reset to SPAWN

      • saveGame

        private void saveGame()
        This method will save the current state, it is called at the end of each turn.

      • waitForMinPlayer

        private void waitForMinPlayer()
        this method is used after loading a game from file to make the controller wait for the min number of player before starting the handleTurn method
        See Also:
        handleTurnPhase()

      • spawn

        public void spawn​(PowerUpType type,
                  Color color)
        This method will be called by the view Class to make the player spawn
        Parameters:
        type - is the type of the powerUp to discard
        color - is the color of the PowerUp to discard

      • drawPowerUp

        public void drawPowerUp()
        this method will make the current player draw a powerUp

        public void discardPowerUp​(PowerUpType type,
                           Color color)
        This method will discard a powerUp
        Parameters:
        type - is the type of the powerUp to discard
        color - is the color of the powerUp to discard

      • doAction

        public void doAction​(JsonAction jsonAction)
        This method will be called from the view class and will make the player do an action
        Parameters:
        jsonAction - is the class containing al the param required to do an action
        See Also:
        JsonAction

      • checkActionIsFrenzy

        private void checkActionIsFrenzy()
        this method is used for the frenzyShoot action to ensure that the player will not perform a frenzy shoot while frenzy is not enabled is used only in this case because for the others actions the action type is the same so this case will be evaluated internally

      • checkActionIsNotFrenzy

        private void checkActionIsNotFrenzy()
        this method is used for the shoot action to ensure that the player will not perform a shoot while frenzy is enabled is used only in this case because for the others actions the action type is the same so this case will be evaluated internally

      • askMoveValid

        public boolean askMoveValid​(int row,
                            int column,
                            Directions direction)
        Parameters:
        row - is the start cell row
        column - is the start cell column
        direction - is the direction the player wants to move
        Returns:
        true if the player can make a movement in this direction
